long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This application is designed to provide AiBUY's clients with the most convenient tool for importing e-commerce products into Management Portal directly from the client's website. Using this extension gives the user freedom to import any product from the most popular marketplaces. After importing users can easily attach products to overlay with a few mouse clicks. Note: You must have an active AiBUY account to use this extension.
